translation:
Reserved

Most Illustrious Sir

For the good of the service of the State, it is necessary to inform that the gentlemen Prados, officers of the distinguished Division to the husband of Your Lordship Manuel José Ferreira, have attempted the seduction of soldiers, who tell me they assert to persons residing here.

God keep Your Lordship

Secretariat of State for the Affairs of Justice in Caçapava, February 28, 1839. Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.
